hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/44389cabb923fdd1f07586cfc19722f3.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{?} \text{ gorillas on time}\\
+&\underline{ \blue{10} \text{ gorillas came late}}\\
=&\pink{20} \text{ gorillas in school}\end{align}$

question.content:
Some gorillas came on time to school this morning. $10$ gorillas came late. There were $20$ gorillas in school today.

 **How many gorillas came on time? **

[[☃ input-number 1]] gorillas
